summary: AXON SOVEREIGN application - a unified SPA with glassmorphic login portal, dynamic dashboard (Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, Vault), real-time waveform visualization, KPI tracking (Asset Shield, Neural Ingest, Vocal Health), subscription tiers, and authentication system with secret bypass
architectural_notes: Single Page Application (SPA) architecture with two main views: auth-page and dashboard-page
Glassmorphic design system for login portal
Real-time waveform visualization using spectral analysis
Dashboard sections: Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, Vault
known_issues: Blank screen issue - syntax errors with unclosed brackets/arrays

existing_features.title: Fix all syntax errors causing blank screen by ensuring every curly brace { } and square bracket [ ] is properly closed throughout the codebase

Implement Single Page Application (SPA) structure with two main view sections: <div id='auth-page'> for authentication and <div id='dashboard-page' style='display:none'> for the dashboard, toggling visibility based on authentication state
Restore the glassmorphic login panel with a 'Full Name' registration field matching the design shown in images (4).jpeg
Fix registration flow to save user data to 'localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER' and immediately set the view to 'dashboard' without any intermediate steps
Restore dashboard sidebar navigation with five sections: Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, and Vault, matching the layout shown in sc.png and the reference video
Add three-tier subscription pricing cards under the Vault section with Free, ₹299/month, and ₹499/month tiers
Display the registered user's Full Name dynamically in the dashboard sidebar, removing any hardcoded 'Nishant' references
Add a Logout button to the dashboard that clears the session from localStorage and returns the view to 'auth-page'
Implement login validation that displays an 'Invalid Credentials' toast notification when login fails
Implement secret bypass feature: clicking the 'AXON' logo 3 times immediately force-shows the Dashboard, sets the user as 'Sovereign Administrator', and unlocks the ₹499 subscription plan

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix blank screen - clear syntax errors, ensure proper bracket/array closure, implement SPA structure with auth-page and dashboard-page sections
Restore glassmorphic login portal with Full Name registration field, save to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER, immediately switch to dashboard view
Restore dashboard with sidebar navigation (Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, Vault)
Implement KPI row with Asset Shield (₹1,241,310+ ticker), Neural Ingest (link input), and Vocal Health gauge
Add real-time animating Waveform (Live Spectral Analysis) and Synopsis Engine to dashboard center
Add 3-tier subscription pricing cards (Free, ₹299, ₹499) under Vault section
Display dynamic user Full Name in dashboard sidebar and add Logout button that clears session and returns to auth-page
Implement login validation with 'Invalid Credentials' toast on failure
Add secret bypass: 3 clicks on AXON logo force-shows Dashboard as 'Sovereign Administrator' with ₹499 plan unlocked
Implement KPI row with three components: Asset Shield displaying ₹1,241,310 with live incrementing ticker, Neural Ingest with link input field, and Vocal Health gauge
Add real-time animating Waveform visualization labeled 'Live Spectral Analysis' in the center of the dashboard
Add Synopsis Engine component in the center of the dashboard alongside the waveform visualization
